interactive

Class Logfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactive.Logfile

  • public class Logfile
extends java.lang.Object
    Logfile to track the actions in the interactive board handling for automatic replay.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

      • start_scope

        public void start_scope(LogfileScope p_logfile_scope,
                        boolean p_boolean_value)
        Marks the beginning of a new scope in the olutput stream Writes also 1, if p_boolean_value is true, or 0, if p_boolean_value is false;

        p_boolean_value - a boolean.

      • start_read_scope

        public LogfileScope start_read_scope()
        Reads the next scope iidentifier from the logfile. Returns null if no more item scope was found.
        Returns:
        a LogfileScope object.

        adds an int to the logfile
        Parameters:
        p_int - a int.

      • read_int

        public int read_int()
        Reads the next int from the logfile. Returns -1, if no valid integer was found.
        Returns:
        a int.
